alert.note: Alert for Adams; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR CLAY...NORTHERN NUCKOLLS...NORTHEASTERN WEBSTER...SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS...WESTERN FILLMORE AND NORTHWESTERN THAYER COUNTIES... At 814 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lawrence, or 15 miles southeast of Hastings, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. There have also been reports of blowing dust out ahead of the thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Fairfield and Deweese around 825 PM CDT. Edgar around 840 PM CDT. Oak around 845 PM CDT. Ong around 850 PM CDT. Davenport around 855 PM CDT. Shickley around 900 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
